intro.title: Federation-wide databank and reporting system
intro.lead: The Federation-wide Databank and Reporting System (FDRS) provides data insights on the world's largest humanitarian organization.

items.title: The IFRC at a glance
items.description: See our work in numbers. This tool will give you an overview of what the entire Federation looks like.

items.title: National Society profiles
items.description: Interested in a particular National Society or a specific region? This tool is for you. Here you can also download profiles as PDFs.

items.title: "Everyone Counts" report
items.description: Our latest findings are also published in the form of an interactive report. Explore the report online, or download a PDF version.

insights.title: Latest insights
insights.subtitle: Exceptional coverage
insights.description: In 2015, all 190 National Societies have reported to FDRS on at least 1 key indicator. We thank the National Societies worldwide for their efforts to improve transparency and accountability of the IFRC.
